chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> MF.expo m x y -> eqc m x y

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
eqc = fix eqc (m : fmap) (x y : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x = x0 /\ y = x0 \/ eqc m0 x y | L m0 _ x0 y0 => eqc m0 x y \/ eqc m0 x x0 /\ eqc m0 y0 y \/ eqc m0 x y0 /\ eqc m0 x0 y end : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
dart = nat : Set
eqc_trans : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), eqc m x y -> eqc m y z -> eqc m x z
eqc_symm : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), eqc m x y -> eqc m y x
eqc_eqc_cF : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x y -> eqc m x (cF m y)
eqc_cA_1_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m (cA_1 m k x) y -> eqc m x y
eqc_eqc_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x y -> eqc m x (cA_1 m k y)
eqc_eqc_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x y -> eqc m x (cA m k y)
eqc_cA_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x (cA m k y) -> eqc m x y
eqc_exd_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), eqc m x y -> exd m x /\ exd m y
MF.upb_sum_bound : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ MF.expo m x y -> (MF.Iter_upb m x + MF.Iter_upb m y <= ndN m)%nat
MF.degree_sum_bound : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ MF.expo m x y -> (MF.degree m x + MF.degree m y <= ndN m)%nat
MF.orb_impls_expo : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> impls (MF.Iter_orb m x) (MF.Iter_orb m y) -> MF.expo m x y
MF.disjs_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ MF.expo m x y -> disjs (MF.Iter_orb m x) (MF.Iter_orb m y)
MF.disjs_orb_not_expo : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> disjs (MF.Iter_orb m x) (MF.Iter_orb m y) -> ~ MF.expo m x y
MF.expo_eq_eqs_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> MF.expo m x y < -> eqs (MF.Iter_orb m x) (MF.Iter_orb m y)
MF.impls_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> MF.expo m x y -> impls (MF.Iter_orb m x) (MF.Iter_orb m y)
MF.not_expo_disjs_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ MF.expo m x y < -> disjs (MF.Iter_orb m x) (MF.Iter_orb m y)
MF.eqs_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> MF.expo m x y -> eqs (MF.Iter_orb m x) (MF.Iter_orb m y)
MF.incls_minus : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ MF.expo m x y -> let s := fmap_to_set m in let sx := MF.Iter_orb m x in let sy := MF.Iter_orb m y in incls sy (set_minus s sx)
MA0.impls_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> MA0.expo m x y -> impls (MA0.Iter_orb m x) (MA0.Iter_orb m y)
MA0.eqs_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> MA0.expo m x y -> eqs (MA0.Iter_orb m x) (MA0.Iter_orb m y)
eqc_dec : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), {eqc m x y} + {~ eqc m x y}
eqc_refl : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), exd m x -> eqc m x x
eqc_cA_1_r : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (cA_1 m k x)
eqc_cA_r : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (cA m k x)
prec_L = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart) => exd m x /\ exd m y /\ ~ succ m k x /\ ~ pred m k y /\ cA m k x <> y : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> Prop
MF.card_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> card (MF.Iter_orb m x) = MF.Iter_upb m x
MF.expo_symm : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MF.expo m z t -> MF.expo m t z
MF.incls_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (MF.Iter_orb m x) (fmap_to_set m)
MF.incls_rem : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (MF.Iter_rem m x) (fmap_to_set m)
MA0.incls_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (MA0.Iter_orb m x) (fmap_to_set m)
MF.exds_orb_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exds (MF.Iter_orb m x) z -> exd m z
MF.expo_trans : forall (m : fmap) (z t u : dart), MF.expo m z t -> MF.expo m t u -> MF.expo m z u
MF.expo_exd : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MF.expo m z t -> exd m t
MF.between_expo : forall (m : fmap) (z v t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MF.between m z v t -> MF.expo m z v /\ MF.expo m z t
MF.period_expo : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MF.expo m z t -> MF.Iter_upb m z = MF.Iter_upb m t
MF.expo_degree : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MF.expo m z t -> MF.degree m z = MF.degree m t
eqc_Iter_cF : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> eqc m z (Iter (cF m) n z)
B_1_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> B_1 m k x = B m k (A_1 m k x)
MF.expo_eq_exds_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MF.expo m z t < -> exds (MF.Iter_orb m z) t
MF.expo_refl : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z -> MF.expo m z z

``` 
intros m x y Hmap Hexpo.
induction Hexpo.
- apply eqc_refl. apply inv_hmap_exd with (m:=m) (x:=x)...
- apply eqc_trans with (y:=y).
  + apply IHHexpo. apply inv_hmap_expo_exd with (m:=m) (x:=x)...
  + apply eqc_eqc_cF. apply inv_hmap_expo_exd with (m:=m) (x:=x)...
    apply IHHexpo.
```

original: intros m x y Hmap Hexpo. induction Hexpo. - apply eqc_refl. apply inv_hmap_exd with (m:=m) (x:=x)... - apply eqc_trans with (y:=y). + apply IHHexpo. apply inv_hmap_expo_exd with (m:=m) (x:=x)... + apply eqc_eqc_cF. apply inv_hmap_expo_exd with (m:=m) (x:=x)... apply IHHexpo.
